snippet: The company said revenue rose 2.3 percent to $636 million, from $622 million in the same quarter a year earlier, and beat Wall Street forecasts.
lead_paragraph: The company said revenue rose 2.3 percent to $636 million, from $622 million in the same quarter a year earlier, and beat Wall Street forecasts.

headline.main: Comerica Beats Expectations as Profit Jumps 5.7 Percent
headline.print_headline: Comerica Beats Expectations As Profit Jumps 5.7 Percent
